name: Hard Rock Bubble Shooter
description:
Shoot and pop bubbles in a brand-new puzzle adventure around the world! Play the super fun Hard Rock Bubble Shooter game and crush your way through thousands of amazing levels and challenges. Popping bubbles was never this awesome!

Each new level has a different target you need to reach, so plan your moves carefully and fire away. With plenty of awesome brain-teasers and quests, Hard Rock Bubble Shooter provides endless hours of excitement and fun!

Fans of logic and board games? Get ready to show your skills! Match 3 or more balls of the same color to pop and smash your way around tricky challenges. Train your brain and color matching skills as you advance along the map and unlock more fun puzzles.


Game Features:
• Exciting shooting adventure around the Hard Rock universe.
• Journey through amazing puzzles in this super fun bubble pop game.
• Cool gifts and rewards. Check out the daily calendar to get an awesome prize!
• Classic game mode.
• Wonderful graphics and designs.
• Rockin’ challenges and quests to solve.
• Free to play online or offline.
• Easy to learn bubbles game. Fun to play with families and friends.
• Special boosters to help you pass levels and reach high scores.


Pop, Blast & Win!
Tap on the screen to shoot balloons, make combos and plan your moves to clear the board. Ready, aim, fire! Shoot and explode them in the best bubble shooter adventure! Warm up your fingers and prepare for hours of endless excitement and fun.

Enjoy the Ultimate Shooter
Hard Rock Bubble Shooter is a great puzzle game with thousands of challenging levels to satisfy your itch for fun puzzles! There is no time limit so you can play at your own pace and enjoy the most relaxing arcade game.

How to Play:
• Drag your finger to move the laser aim and lift it to smash bubbles.
• Match at least 3 balloons of the same color to pop the combo and win points.
• Explore thousands of amazing puzzle levels.
• Blast and crash all the balls to level up.
• Swap bubbles and plan your moves in this exciting worldwide adventure.
• Improve your bubble shooting skills - clear a level with fewer moves to get a higher score!
• Unlock power-ups and match them with each other to generate big explosions.
• Drop 10 bubbles in a single shot to get a Disco Ball that will burst the surrounding bubbles.
• Pop 7 bubbles in a row and to get a Sonic Cannon that will cut through a pass.
Play now and explore all the awesome surprises and joys this game has to offer!

Liked the game? We would love to get your feedback! Let us know what we can add to make your gameplay even more enjoyable and earn your 5-star review.

Hard Rock Bubble Shooter is free to play, but some optional in-game items will require payment.
